short_summary: Cellebrite various software licenses for Shared Services Canada
description: Request for Quotation for Cellebrite various software licenses for Shared Services Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Information

- **Solicitation Title**: Cellebrite
- **Solicitation Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022811:T
- **Solicitation Amendment**: No amendments
- **Solicitation Number**: BPM018883/22811
- **Publication Date**: May 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 29, 2023, at 11:00 AM (EST)

## Contract Details

- **GSIN (Government Supply Category)**: ADP Software (N7030)
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:

- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Atlantic Procurement Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Entity

- **Contracting Entity Name**: Shared Services Canada
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 5Y7
- **Contracting Entity Contact**: Geoffrey Lalor, procurement@ssc-spc.gc.ca, 613-462-2730

## Tender Documents

The solicitation documents are available at:

-English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/2FBE0651-7023-4CD8-B71D-476C922EA577, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E9EC1B9B-D493-434D-94F8-C9E1036F5CE3
-French: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/C5DB329D-ABEF-4691-8521-150
